scripts.compile: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build.js && backpack build
scripts.compile:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build.js && backpack build
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build.js && backpack dev
scripts.dev:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build.js && cross-env DEBUG=express:* backpack dev
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node build.js && jest --forceExit --config unit.config.json --detectOpenHandles
scripts.test:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node build.js && jest --forceExit --config unit.config.json --detectOpenHandles
scripts.itest:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node build.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=test backpack build
scripts.itest:run: concurrent --kill-others --success first "cd build && node main" "wait-port localhost:3000 && jest --forceExit --config itest.config.json"
